channel.title: dotnet on Stuart Blackler's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in dotnet on Stuart Blackler's Blog

item.title: Diagnostics in .Net Core 3: Event Counters
item.description: Recently, I've been playing with the new diagnostic improvements in .Net Core 3. Traditionally, I've always used the great AppMetrics package to capture the metrics from our applications and send scrape them with a Prometheus & Grafana setup. When reading about the improvements, I wondered whether or not it would be possible to push metrics to Prometheus.
